General.Name: Spinnova Oy
General.Description: Spinnova Oyj engages in the development, production, and sale of textile fiber and materials in Finland. The company produces SPINNOVA fiber, which is made from various raw materials, such as wood, leather, textile, agricultural, food, and beverage industry waste. Spinnova Oyj was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Jyväskylä, Finland.
